law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Selection A (Additional member contributions)" means the retirement selection described in § 22-219 of this title.
"Selection B (Limited cost-of-living adjustment)" means the retirement selection described in § 22-220 of this title.
"Selection C (Combination formula)" means the retirement selection described in § 22-221 of this title.
